name: Plontventure
description:
Your goal is to survive the outside world and find a suitable spot to grow your new roots into and rise up to be a beautiful tree!

This is a small game my group and I made for a Mini Game Jam in our class! The topic was a "non-human PoV" so we decided to have a cute, walking plant. We're overall pretty proud especially considering we only had 6 hours to "complete" this game.
You can walk with A & D, jump with Space and sprint with Shift

We might finish this some day but that's no guarantee~

Blessings of the Moon
